A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Likes:
-Soundtracks are always great!
-Pacing is alright.
-Cinematography is decent and camera angles are not distracting.
-Explored the SW universe more (creatures\, planets\, societies...)
-Character development is okay\, right?
-Unconventional SW formula but not really\, I guess...
-Makes the pre-sequel bootlickers nauseated because we don't have Mark being all the traditional heroic figure

Dislikes:
-Use of wide lenses and stretched the characters like never before. Adam and Daisy look super wide onscreen.
-Almighty and powerful Snoke took a cheap death.
-A bit lengthy just to tell a story of what came before and what's going to come next.
-Classic SW elements never changed.
-Different from Empire Strikes Back? Somehow I felt it's quite formulaic too.
-Myself being bored of the same old story liao...New saga would help with this personal problem

Rant:
-Super Leia anyone?
-They cannot bear having Luke teach Rey all the three lessons eh?
-How they found DJ. haha\, such a coincidence eh
-Holdo and DJ are okay but yeah...
-Had to kiss before passing out? Dang cringy it is...
-Certain CG shots paused for too long and look weird
